attributes.action: Review CSA to all using the same calculations be it old or new scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is disgusting that people in the same financial situation are having calculations made at different rates because of this so called new and old system.  It is also ridiculous that a serving member of the Armed Forces can have deductions taken from their salary without permission, when other members of Joe Public can hide away claim benefits and live the life of Riley!
